name: scythe
description: Give Claude full control of REAPER DAW â€” 82 tools for tracks, FX, MIDI, automation, rendering and more
long_description: Scythe is an MCP server that lets Claude control REAPER DAW via reapy. 82 tools across 16 domains: project/transport, tracks, track FX, take FX, sends/receives, markers/regions, tempo, media items, MIDI notes/CC, envelopes/automation, time selection, actions, extended state, audio/MIDI devices, and rendering.

tools.name: get_project_info
tools.description: Get current project info: name, BPM, time signature, track count, sample rate

tools.name: get_transport_state
tools.description: Get transport state: playing, paused, recording, cursor position

tools.name: set_cursor_position
tools.description: Move the edit cursor to a position in seconds

tools.name: transport_play
tools.description: Start playback

tools.name: transport_stop
tools.description: Stop playback or recording

tools.name: transport_pause
tools.description: Pause playback

tools.name: transport_record
tools.description: Start recording

tools.name: save_project
tools.description: Save the project, optionally to a new file path

tools.name: list_tracks
tools.description: List all tracks with volume, pan, mute, solo, arm status

tools.name: get_track_info
tools.description: Get detailed info about a single track

tools.name: add_track
tools.description: Add a new track at a given index

tools.name: delete_track
tools.description: Delete a track from the project

tools.name: set_track_name
tools.description: Rename a track

tools.name: set_track_volume
tools.description: Set track volume in dB

tools.name: set_track_pan
tools.description: Set track pan position

tools.name: set_track_mute_solo
tools.description: Set mute and/or solo state on a track

tools.name: set_track_record_arm
tools.description: Arm or disarm a track for recording

tools.name: set_track_color
tools.description: Set track display color with RGB values

tools.name: list_track_fx
tools.description: List all FX on a track

tools.name: get_track_fx_params
tools.description: Get all parameters of a track FX plugin

tools.name: get_track_fx_preset
tools.description: Get the current preset name and index for a track FX

tools.name: add_track_fx
tools.description: Add an FX plugin to a track's FX chain

tools.name: remove_track_fx
tools.description: Remove an FX plugin from a track's FX chain

tools.name: set_track_fx_enabled
tools.description: Enable or bypass an FX plugin on a track

tools.name: set_track_fx_param
tools.description: Set a parameter value on a track FX

tools.name: set_track_fx_preset
tools.description: Set or navigate FX presets on a track

tools.name: copy_track_fx
tools.description: Copy an FX plugin from one track to another

tools.name: list_take_fx
tools.description: List all FX on a media item's active take

tools.name: get_take_fx_params
tools.description: Get all parameters of a take FX plugin

tools.name: add_take_fx
tools.description: Add an FX plugin to a take's FX chain

tools.name: remove_take_fx
tools.description: Remove an FX plugin from a take's FX chain

tools.name: set_take_fx_param
tools.description: Set a parameter value on a take FX

tools.name: list_track_sends
tools.description: List all sends on a track

tools.name: list_track_receives
tools.description: List all receives on a track

tools.name: create_send
tools.description: Create a new send from one track to another

tools.name: remove_send
tools.description: Remove a send from a track

tools.name: set_send_volume_pan
tools.description: Set volume and/or pan on a track send

tools.name: set_send_mute
tools.description: Mute or unmute a track send

tools.name: list_markers
tools.description: List all markers in the project

tools.name: list_regions
tools.description: List all regions in the project

tools.name: add_marker
tools.description: Add a marker at a position in seconds

tools.name: add_region
tools.description: Add a region spanning from start to end

tools.name: delete_marker_or_region
tools.description: Delete a marker or region by index

tools.name: go_to_marker
tools.description: Move the edit cursor to a marker

tools.name: get_tempo_info
tools.description: Get master tempo and all tempo/time-signature markers

tools.name: add_tempo_marker
tools.description: Add a tempo marker at a position

tools.name: edit_tempo_marker
tools.description: Edit a tempo marker's BPM and/or time signature

tools.name: delete_tempo_marker
tools.description: Delete a tempo marker by index

tools.name: list_items_on_track
tools.description: List all media items on a track

tools.name: get_selected_items
tools.description: Get all currently selected media items

tools.name: add_empty_item
tools.description: Add an empty media item to a track

tools.name: delete_item
tools.description: Delete a media item from a track

tools.name: set_item_position
tools.description: Move a media item to a new position

tools.name: set_item_length
tools.description: Set the length of a media item

tools.name: split_item
tools.description: Split a media item at a position

tools.name: create_midi_item
tools.description: Create a new empty MIDI item on a track

tools.name: list_midi_notes
tools.description: List all MIDI notes in an item

tools.name: add_midi_note
tools.description: Add a MIDI note to an item

tools.name: delete_midi_note
tools.description: Delete a MIDI note by index

tools.name: set_midi_note
tools.description: Edit an existing MIDI note's properties

tools.name: list_midi_cc
tools.description: List all MIDI CC events in an item

tools.name: add_midi_cc
tools.description: Add a MIDI CC event to an item

tools.name: delete_midi_cc
tools.description: Delete a MIDI CC event by index

tools.name: list_track_envelopes
tools.description: List all envelopes on a track

tools.name: get_envelope_points
tools.description: Get all points on a track envelope

tools.name: add_envelope_point
tools.description: Add a point to a track envelope

tools.name: delete_envelope_points
tools.description: Delete envelope points within a time range

tools.name: set_track_automation_mode
tools.description: Set automation mode for a track

tools.name: add_automation_item
tools.description: Add an automation item to a track envelope

tools.name: get_time_selection
tools.description: Get the current time selection and loop state

tools.name: set_time_selection
tools.description: Set the time selection range

tools.name: set_loop
tools.description: Enable or disable looping with optional start/end points

tools.name: perform_action
tools.description: Execute any REAPER action by command ID

tools.name: lookup_command_id
tools.description: Look up the command ID for a named action

tools.name: perform_named_action
tools.description: Look up and execute a named action in one step

tools.name: get_ext_state
tools.description: Read a value from REAPER's extended state store

tools.name: set_ext_state
tools.description: Write a value to REAPER's extended state store

tools.name: delete_ext_state
tools.description: Delete a key from REAPER's extended state store

tools.name: list_audio_devices
tools.description: Get audio device info including input/output counts

tools.name: list_midi_devices
tools.description: List available MIDI input and output devices

tools.name: insert_media
tools.description: Insert a media file onto a track at a position

tools.name: render_project
tools.description: Render the project with current render settings
